tool.name: GFF3 Location Filter
tool.description: filter gff3 features based on location

param.name: id_start_end_data
param.label: Requested Locations
param.help: table with record ids, start locations, and end locations

tool.help:
**What it does**
Filters gff3 features based on locality. The tool accepts a table (bed3) file with record ID, start, and end locations. If a given feature overlaps a feature in the table, it will be output, otherwise it will be removed.
